Application.Controller

Class IndexController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Application.Controller.IndexController

  • @Controller
public class IndexController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class for managing the home page of the platform. The main page is made of different components that are shown as the User(s) interact with them. The main page also manages the cookies and the authorizations to join the platform.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Corti Lorenzo, Tocchetti Andrea

    • Method Detail

      • getIndexPage

        @RequestMapping(value="/",
                method=GET)
public java.lang.String getIndexPage(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                            @RequestParam(value="ref",required=false)
                                                                                            java.lang.String referral,
                                                                                            @CookieValue(value="user_id",defaultValue="NULL")
                                                                                            java.lang.String user_id,
                                                                                            javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                                                                                     throws JarAccessException
        Returns the main page of the platform.
        Parameters:
        model - Spring Model object.
        referral - The referral code of the User.
        user_id - The unique identifier of the User.
        response - Instance of HttpServletRequest.
        Returns:
        "index" string indicating the name of the Thymeleaf template to parse and return to the client.
        Throws:
        JarAccessException - JarAccessException, exception thrown by LanguageFilesUtils when trying to access files of the deployed and running jar.

      • saveUpdateCookie

        @ResponseBody
 @RequestMapping(value="/saveUpdateCookieConsent",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String saveUpdateCookie(@RequestParam(value="consent")
                                                                                                                                       boolean consent,
                                                                                                                                       @CookieValue(value="user_id",defaultValue="NULL")
                                                                                                                                       java.lang.String user_id,
                                                                                                                                       javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                                                                                                                                       @RequestParam(name="referral",required=false,defaultValue="universal")
                                                                                                                                       java.lang.String referral)
        Saves the cookies consent of the User.
        Parameters:
        consent - The boolean values representing whether the User accepted the consent of the cookies or not.
        user_id - The unique identifier of the User.
        response - Instance of HttpServletRequest.
        referral - The referral code of the User.
        Returns:
        "true" or "false" depending on whether or not the User consented to the cookies.

      • getJoinButtons

        @RequestMapping(value="/getJoinButtons",
                method=GET)
public java.lang.String getJoinButtons(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Returns the fragment with the buttons to explore the platform.
        Parameters:
        model - Spring Model object.
        Returns:
        "fragments/join-buttons-fragment :: join-buttons" string indicating the name of the Thymeleaf template to parse and return to the client.
